items.label: Host a Micro-Dinner
items.description: Invite 2 people. Cook something simple. Do it this week.

items.label: Start a Specialist Group
items.description: 'Brussels Hikers', 'Sunday Brunch Club'. Be the admin.

items.label: Audit Your Time
items.description: Stop hanging out with people who drain your energy just because you are lonely.

items.label: The Follow Up
items.description: Met someone cool? Text them the next day. 'Great meeting you, let's grab coffee.'
